titleStmt.title: Harmonia sacra, or, Divine hymns and dialogues Second book. : with a thorow-bass for the theorbo-lute, bass-viol, harpsichord, or organ / composed by the best masters of the last and present age ; the words by several learned and pious persons.
titleStmt.author: Playford, Henry, b. 1657.
Purcell, Henry, 1659-1695.
Gribelin, Simon, 1661 or 2-1733.

titleStmt.title: Harmonia sacra, or, Divine hymns and dialogues Second book. : with a thorow-bass for the theorbo-lute, bass-viol, harpsichord, or organ / composed by the best masters of the last and present age ; the words by several learned and pious persons.
titleStmt.author: Playford, Henry, b. 1657.
Purcell, Henry, 1659-1695.
Gribelin, Simon, 1661 or 2-1733.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Edward Jones for Henry Playford ...,

notesStmt.note: Edited in part by Henry Purcell.
Volume 2 has added engraved t.p. signed: S. Gribelin inven. et sculps.
V. 1 is found at reel 506:8; v. 2 is found at reel 1709:6.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
